players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "Bob is the mafioso and I think he's trying to hide his identity by acting innocent."
Bob: "That's a bold accusation, Charlie, with zero evidence. Why are you so quick to point fingers on day one?"
You: "Charlie, why are you so confident Bob is mafia? Do you have information or is this just a hunch?"
You: "Charlie, if you're the detective, now is the time to claim. Otherwise, your baseless accusation looks suspicious."
Bob: "Alice makes a good point. Charlie's accusation without evidence or a detective claim is highly suspicious. I'm leaning towards voting Charlie."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice
